test/fixtures/type-error/global-assignment.lys
    1│ var x = 1
    2│ 
    3│ fun addOne(): i32 = {
    4│   x = x + false
     │       ^^^^^^^^^ Invalid signature. Expecting arguments type (i32, i32) but got (i32, boolean)
     │           ^^^^^ Type mismatch: Type "boolean" is not assignable to "i32"
    5│ }
